roleset.name: improve

example.name: with only arg 1
example.text: new equipment, new armored vehicles, fuel for ships and planes, upgrades on garrison facilities

roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to upgrade.02-v. Upgrade.02 is a member of VN class appoint-29.1. No FN class. Framed by Katie.

example.name: an animate entity can be the thing improving when the situation causes a change
